summary: So I’m thinking of doing a blind liveblog of BNHA
title: So I’m thinking of doing a blind liveblog of BNHA
body:
Despite never avoiding spoilers on my dashboard, I don’t really know anything about the plot of the show. I’ve got a good idea of some of the characters, like Izuku’s dedication to destroying himself in the name of superhero training, and the OP egg timer and best dad All Might. It looks fun (and funny), and I can already tell I’ll get attached to the characters. So…

How would you guys like me to do this?

  1. Stream on rabb.it
  2. Post on tumblr in realtime (a la @loreweaver-universe)
  3. Watch the episodes on my own and do long write-ups after the fact

Vote here. I’ll leave it up until 3 pm MST (about 46 hours from now) and then start with whatever y’all choose.

tags: boku no hero academia x reader
title: Combat Training [Todoroki x Reader]
body:
I’ve been having a hard time lately and writing it hard to get to when people are breathing down your back. Anyway, this is short but it took two days to write. I hope you enjoy. 

Warnings for combat? lol, I don’t think there’s any cursing. If you like what you read, please leave a comment. Comments are nice, lovely things! And if you would like a request, please send them in. The Ask Box is always open. 

While training, it always depended on the fighting style. You believed it always best to be trained in every combat style and technique in case of emergency. You never knew what situation you would end up finding yourself in, so you wanted to be as prepared as you could be. Most of your classmates knew this and often feed your hunger, especially if they wanted a good fight. However, there were some who wanted to see your skill level, which is what you guessed Todoroki wanted when he asked you to spar him after class.

It was where you found your current situation, hand to hand combat training without the use of quirks. It was raw and unforgiving, but Todoroki was pretty good at it. You had seen him when he practiced alone or would train with others in your class, leading to you concluding that he almost rivaled your abilities of close hand to hand combat. He didn’t know how well you actually were.

He stood across from you, everything up until now being a little bit of stretching and you trying to make jokes that just didn’t land. However, he was completely ready to put his all into this training. You still had no idea why he had asked you of all people to train with you. Maybe someone told him to train with you as a joke and he took it seriously, but you didn’t want to think that someone did that to him.

But now it was time to start taking things a little more seriously. Without much of a clear “go”, you ran at him, watching his body take a defensive position. His arm reached out at you, hand balled into a fist, but you were quick to dodge, moving to the side and ducking low. Your foot swiped his feet from under him, too fast for him to properly process what was happening. His body hit the ground and you quickly reached for his wrists, pinning them to the ground.

You chuckled, seeing the nearly blank expression on his face. You could tell from his bicolored eyes that he was thinking, and you thought that it was because he was caught off guard. “Sorry, I’m pretty fast.” But he should already know that, given your enhanced speed quirk.

He was looking into your eyes, face mere inches away from his. You didn’t notice this until- “You’re… really close right now.”

You blinked at him, once. Twice. By the third time, a blush had dusted over your cheeks. You withheld the scream of embarrassment you wanted to let out, hands loosening their grip on him.

Jumping right up, you laughed in an attempt to brush away the awkward. However, with the way he was looking at you, it couldn’t be brushed away so easily. What did it matter if you were kind of really close to Todoroki? It was combat practice, of course you were going to get close to him! How else were you supposed to take him down? But why did he have to say something about it?

“I’m sorry!” you squeaked out, looking at him. It was hard to look at him now, though, so you averted your eyes to look at anything but him. This training session had just become a lot harder to deal with and you didn’t know if you should continue or not.

As you went to stand up, you were pinned down by your opponent. Groaning, you questioned his actions. “What was that for?”

“Weren’t we still sparring?” he asked in return.

You looked up at him. Now he was the one that was really close to you. You blushed again, staring up into his different colored eyes, the ones that you thought were really cute. You didn’t share that thought with anyone though, knowing what most people would think.

“Yeah,” you mumbled, unable to take your eyes off of him now. How did he have this kind of power over you? One minute you can’t look at him and the next you’re practically devouring him with your eyes.

If the circumstances were different, the two of you might of kissed by now, but this wasn’t some action movie with a romantic subplot. This was real life and whether you liked it or not, Todoroki Shoto probably wasn’t going to kiss you while pinning you to the ground.

As if by magnetic force, you felt yourself pushing your body up. Your face closer to his, closing the space in between, and your lips meeting briefly. Your eyes closed, too frightened to see his reaction, but bygolly if he wouldn’t kiss you than you just needed to take the matter into your own hands! You couldn’t do much with your hands pinned above your head, and now that you lay under him like this, there was no escaping what you had just done.

Pulling away slowly, you laid your head against the ground. Your didn’t open your eyes, not wanting to see the look of disgust or shame on his face. He was silent, unmoving, and you thought that perhaps you had indeed screwed up. You knew better! You shouldn’t have done that! Now he’ll probably never speak to you again! On top of it, he’ll probably go back and tell everyone what you did and about hot this was the worst experience ever! You were going to become a laughing stock! You would probably have to-

You mind blanked when you felt the sensation of being kissed make its way over your lips again. Your eyes shot open, meeting the soft face of Todoroki. With his eyes closed, he was kissing you! You couldn’t believe it, heart rate accelerating! This was unbelievable, but you found your eyes fluttering shut again.

To say the least, close hand training was now your favorite kind of training.

blog.name: yandere-love-love-love
blog.title: alright bnha content
blog.description: requests closed (But feel free to send concepts) read the mf rules #ylll rules/// I’m just writing my own shit rn 😎

body:
Yandere BNHA Requests

I write for BNHA ONLY.

The characters I’m willing to write for include manga only characters, and there are some characters that are off limits (Mineta, Eri, Muscular, Spinner, Ibara (vine girl, personal preference I just don’t like her that much lol) and Cryostatis. And none of the stranger pro heroes either, etc washing machine dude: basically no joke requests please).

This is a thirst blog and I am here to BE HORNY😭🤷‍♀️👏💯

Do NOT send me requests you’ve sent to another blog it makes me feel like a fucking npc 😭😭😭 instead take the time to genuinely interact with my blog instead of pretending writers are machines that bang out whatever content you demand ✌️😎

I tend to age students up to pro heroes, but depending on how SFW the request is and the setting, I might leave them as teenagers assuming the reader is also a teenager.

No incest, no weird fetishes, I trust you all to be the judge of what a weird fetish is.

My ask box is very open!!!

Please send any request things through ask, don’t message me about it because my ask box is my only system of organisation. Keep updated with my requests at #ylll request status

Also, check request status- otherwise my messages are open for people who want to chat with me 😎🔥

Yandere x reader requests only please :)

Edit: included to say x readers only

Edit 2: you can request stain now

summary:
*Katsuki walking into the classroom*
Katsuki : Alright, listen up you little shits.
Katsuki : Not you, Ejirou. You're an angel...
body:
*Katsuki walking into the classroom*

Katsuki : Alright, listen up you little shits.

Katsuki : Not you, Ejirou. You’re an angel and we’re thrilled to have you here.
